turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to place an order for Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need three large thick crust pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the first pizza, I need ham, bacon, green pepper, and onion.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the second pizza, I would like a chicken barbecue pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And for the third pizza may I have green pepper, onion, mushroom, and sausage?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 3 large thick crust peppers, one ham, bacon, green pepper, onions, one chicken bbq, and one with green pepper, onion, and sausage, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three large thick-crust pizzas with those toppings. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i'll place that order for you, the total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, may you repeat the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, 3 large thick crust pizzas, one ham, bacon, green peppers, and onions, one chicken bbq, one with green pepper, onion, and sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Picky note, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
